    • Boardgames

      public Boardgames(String serialNumber, String name, String brand, float price, int availableCount, int ageAppropriate, int minPlayers, int maxPlayers, String designers)
      Constructs a Boardgames object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - the serial number of the board game
      name - the name of the board game
      brand - the brand of the board game
      price - the price of the board game
      availableCount - the number of available units of the board game
      ageAppropriate - the age appropriateness of the board game
      minPlayers - the minimum number of players for the board game
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players for the board game
      designers - the designers of the board game

      public boolean isSerialNumberValid(String serialNumber)
      Checks if the given serial number is valid.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - the serial number to check
      Returns:
